title: Attention Missouri: This is your last day to register to vote!
selftext:
#Attention Missouri!

#THIS IS YOUR LAST DAY TO REGISTER TO VOTE!


---------------

**Please register now if you haven't already done so. It only takes a couple minutes.**

#[REGISTER HERE](https://www.usa.gov/register-to-vote)

----------------



#Arizona registration deadline extended to Oct. 23


-------------------

#Illinois has now announced same day in person registration

----------------



#EDIT: Nevada can now register online until October 29th.
